img_above_text:
![Wukong Lanxi 2.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9e/Wukong_Lanxi_2.jpg)
Once you're able to take stock of your new surroundings, you'll find yourself on the outskirts of a village under cover of night. Before heading onward, you may want to backtrack up the hill you were carried down, as you'll find a free green Wisp to absorb in the shack at the top, plus a Monkey-Head Mushroom to harvest.
img_below_text:
Making your way past the scattered homes, the place is eerily quiet, but you can find a few other plants to harvest. Head through the wooded area to find another green Wisp, and you may notice a body hiding up in the trees.
![Wukong Lanxi 4.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6f/Wukong_Lanxi_4.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Lanxi 2.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9e/Wukong_Lanxi_2.jpg)

Before heading onward, you may want to backtrack up the hill you were carried down, as you'll find a free green Wisp to absorb in the shack at the top, plus a Monkey-Head Mushroom to harvest."
        - Following Text: "Making your way past the scattered homes, the place is eerily quiet, but you can find a few other plants to harvest. Head through the wooded area to find another green Wisp, and you may notice a body hiding up in the trees.
![Wukong Lanxi 4.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6f/Wukong_Lanxi_4.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the protagonist crouched in a grassy, wooded area at night. A "Fragrant Jade Flower" has been collected (indicated on the right), and the player is approaching a glowing green Wisp near a structure illuminated by red lanterns. An arrow highlights a body hanging in the trees, adding to the eerie atmosphere. This moment aligns with the guide's narrative of exploring a quiet village outskirts, gathering items, and encountering unsettling details.
